content.title: Start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology
content.author: Steve Jobs
content.quote_text: You've gotta start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology.

generation.prompt: Inspired by the feeling of: A leader who understands that technology is just a tool to solve human problems, not the end goal itself. The magic happens when you truly understand the customer's world.. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
